body.name: ONGREDIENTS Green Tea Cooling Cream, Water Gel Cream, Niacinamide, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrating Cream For Oily Skin, Daily Face Moisturizer, Korean Vegan Skin Care, 2.70 Fl Oz, 1 Pc
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 50 mins
features: Cooling Hydration: Our Green Tea Cooling Cream provides a refreshing burst of moisture, perfect for oily skin, leaving you feeling cool and rejuvenated.
Green Tea Infusion: Experience the hydrating benefits of green tea as it quenches your skin's thirst, leaving it looking and feeling revitalized.
Non-Greasy, Fresh Moisture: Enjoy a non-sticky, fresh texture that provides deep hydration and a soothing sensation, making your skincare routine a breeze.
Peptide & Cooling Agent Complex: This cream boasts a blend of peptides and cooling agents that work together to hydrate and soothe your skin, making it an essential addition to your skincare regimen.
How to use: Take an adequate amount on the skin, apply gently, and let it fully absorb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cream is very sort.
reviews.reviewText: Recommended for Dry Sensitive SkinBeen looking for this kind of soothing cream! It feels so cool on my skin and makes me feel refreshed. My skin is oily, but this cream is non-greasy and hydrating. The texture is light, and it doesn't make my skin greasy. It's like a burst of moisture that my skin needed. Definitely my go-to for a soothing skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lotion is solid!
reviews.reviewText: Love the refreshing feel for my oily skin, without being greasy. I genuinely feel revitalized after applying it. Five stars without a doubt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great NON-HEAVY Moisturizer. Will DEF Buy Again!
reviews.reviewText: Korean skincare is known to be light and airy and this product does not disappoint. I live in the Midwest where we are going through winter right now and it provides the right amount of moisture without feeling greasy at all. It also absorbs into the skin quite quickly and makes your face feel hydrated which is important during this time for me ass I tend to get very dry on my cheeks during this time of year with the cold and the heater being on at all times. I have combination skin and it truly adapts to the weather. This product I know would suit me during any time of the year as it is light and doesn't interfere with my make-up. When it comes to make-up I use the underpainting technique but apply the product with a brush and do not apply foundation. I typically only spot treat/underpaint in areas where it is needed (concealer under the eye, around the nasolabial folds, on any blemishes) and apply a cream blush (with a brush) from Milk and cream contour stick (with a brush) from ABH. There has been no pilling of product with this "Ongredients Daily Aqua Bomb Cream" moisturizer underneath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No smell; nice cooling effect
reviews.reviewText: This daily aqua cream from ONGREDIENTS is so watery feeling and soothing for my skin! I've never tried products from this k-beauty brand before but the ingredients seemed quite high quality so I was interested to see how the formulation holds up to other similar aqua creams. :) So far, this aqua cream is very hydrating and does have a cooling and soothing effect on my skin that I've rarely experienced with other brands. My skin felt very soft and it wasn't greasy or oily on my face with a quick dry down time of only a few minutes.I didn't notice any smells in this product and was unable to find any added fragrance in the ingredient list which is great news for people who have issues with fragrance or sensitivities to smells! I enjoyed the light texture and lack of smell though I personally don't mind fragrance in my skincare as I am not sensitive to it.If you are looking for a good moisturiser that is lightweight and doesn't have a smell, this is a great option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent gel cream!
reviews.reviewText: I'm pretty set in my usual skincare routine, but I like to try new products to see if they will help improve my skin. I began using this gel cream on my face after bathing and so far I'm impressed with it. It's a great consistency, thick enough it feels like a cream, but not watery like some gel creams can get. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and soft to the touch. I love the ingredients, especially green tea, and it feels cooling when it's applied. I'll be continuing to use this and recommend it to anyone looking for a daily gel moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing LIghtweight Cream
reviews.reviewText: Big fan of this cream. it absorbs quickly without leaving behind a tacky or sticky feeling on top of the skin, and leaves my skin feeling well nourished & hydrated even in these dry winter months. It's also lightweight and works well to put on before applying makeup. Gives the skin a slight cooling sensation as well, but not overpowering sensation like a mint tingling sensation, it feels great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight refreshing cream
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly rewarded after applying this cream with some of the most refreshed, moisturized, smooth skin I've had in some time. It was as if my skin was saying thank you.It feels cool after you apply it. It is not even a little greasy. Simply wonderful. There is no odor.Loving this cream, and I recommend it 100%, and I will definitely order more in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, Soothing Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I'm personally a huge fan of gel-like moisturizers, especially for the summer time. However, this one is moisturizing enough for the winter as well! It feels so so nice on the skin and doesn't make me breakout or oily. The scent is light and not overwhelming. I couldn't recommend it enough, this is definitely a hidden gem.
